    Welcome to where I keep my various notes on physics!

    I realised that over the course of my PhD I had typed up a lot of notes on specific topics that might be helpful to anyone who also studies condensed matter at a postgrad level. So here is all the various notes, please contact me if you find any mistakes!

    General Topic Notes

    Notes written when I was learning or preparing a talk on general topics.

    Book/Paper Notes

    Expanding upon papers and distilling books down to their concepts.

    Blog Posts

    Small posts about interesting tidbits on a variety of topics
